item.label: Plugin
item.shortDesc: Causes the execution of an applet or bean. The applet or bean executes in the specified plugin. If the plugin is not available, displays a dialog to initiate the download of the plugin software.

item.label: Fallback
item.shortDesc: The element provides a message for the user if the plugin does not start

item.label: Root
item.shortDesc: Defines standard elements and namespace attributes of tag libraries.

item.label: Expression
item.shortDesc: Contains an expression valid in the scripting language used in the page.

item.label: Scriptlet
item.shortDesc: Contains a code fragment valid in the scripting language used in the page.

item.label: Declaration
item.shortDesc: Declares a variable or method valid in the scripting language used in the page.

item.label: Forward
item.shortDesc: Forwards a request to an HTML file, JSP page, or servlet.

item.label: Param
item.shortDesc: The element passes the name and value of a parameter to the resource.

item.label: Params
item.shortDesc: The element sends parameter names and values to an applet or Bean at startup.

item.label: Include
item.shortDesc: Includes a static resource or the result from another web component.

item.label: UseBean
item.shortDesc: Instantiates or references a bean with a specific name and scope.

item.label: GetProperty
item.shortDesc: Inserts the value of a bean property into the response.

item.label: SetProperty
item.shortDesc: Sets a bean property value or values.

item.label: Directive.Include
item.shortDesc: Includes a resource of text or code when the JSP page is translated.

item.label: Directive.Page
item.shortDesc: Defines attributes that apply to an entire JSP page.

item.label: Directive.Taglib
item.shortDesc: Defines a tag library and prefix for the custom tags used in the JSP page.
